        isSign in interface SignatureBuilder<K extends TrackerBuilder<K>>
        Returns:
        Set to true if the message should be signed. For protecting an entry, this needs to be set to true.

      • keyPair

        public K keyPair(KeyPair keyPair)
        Specified by:
        keyPair in interface SignatureBuilder<K extends TrackerBuilder<K>>
        Parameters:
        keyPair - The keyPair to sing the complete message. The key will be attached to the message and stored potentially with a data object (if there is such an object in the message).
        Returns:
        This class

      • keyPair

        public KeyPair keyPair()
        Specified by:
        keyPair in interface SignatureBuilder<K extends TrackerBuilder<K>>
        Returns:
        The current keypair to sign the message. If null, no signature is applied.
